Poaceae :
Calamagrostis epigeios
(L.),
Agropyrum repens
(L.) ( Ponomarenko 1997 ).

China ( Fujian, Gansu, Guizhou, Hebei, Heilongjiang, Henan, Hubei, Jiangxi, Shaanxi, Sichuan, Xizang, Xinjiang ), Russia , Europe
.
This species is newly reported for China .
